Name: Abduction
Text: Exile an enemy Ally for 1 turn. It becomes Confused.

Name: Backstab
Text: If the next Attack target has a Condition, +20 damage. If this Character is Stealthed, +20 damage.

Text: Summon a Bananatron.

Text: Buff this Character's HP +20.

Name: Boon of Apophis

Text: Buff all Melee Allies +10 Attack and give them Shield.

Text: Deal 20 damage to target enemy and 10 damage to 2 adjacent allies.

Name: Dino Smash
Text: Deal 15 damage to all Melee enemies.

Name: Double Tap
Text: Make 2 Actions per turn.

Name: Dream Garden
Text: Target any Character: if it's friendly, Restore & Heal 10. If it's an enemy, give it Paralyze 2 & Poison 2.

Text: Buff Attack based on Elemental Class (Earth: 25% chance to Poison 1)

Text: Buff Attack based on Elemental Class (Fire: 25% chance to Burn)

Text: Buff Attack based on Elemental Class (Water: 25% chance to Freeze)

Name: Enrage
Text: This Character becomes Enraged (takes & deals +10 damage) for 2 turns.

Name: Enraged
Text: This Character takes & deals +10 damage.

Name: Exalted Deity
Text: This gets +10/+0 until end of turn for each friendly unit.

Name: Flying
Text: This Character hovers in the air, avoiding melee attackers and evading melee blockers.

Text: Flip a coin; if it's heads deal 30 damage to target enemy and self; if it's tails deal 60 damage.

Name: Grass Blades
Text: Buff Attack +10.

Text: Give this Character 25% chance to Paralyze 1 on Attacks.

Name: Hexproof
Text: This Character cannot be targeted by Spells or Abilities.

Text: Grants Iaijutsu passive (can attack immediately)

Name: Iaijutsu
Text: Grants Iaijutsu passive (can attack immediately)

Text: Slash target enemy 1-4 times randomly, each dealing 10 damage.

Name: Kingsguard
Text: Summon up to 2 Zombie Sneks. Recoil 4.

Name: KNOB Blaster

Text: Deal 15 damage to all enemies in this lane, ignores Shield.

Name: Ninjutsu

Name: Psionic Blast

Text: Throw 2 darts of 10 damage and 50% Asleep chance to any target(s).

Name: Rampage

Name: Regen

Name: Sandstorm

Name: Taunt
